patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: We sell coffee and tea
We have coffee and tea
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: When do I get my delivery?

Shipping takes 2-4 days
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.

patterns: Can you tell me a joke?
responses: Why did the coffee file a police report? It got mugged!
How does a penguin build its house? Igloos it together!
I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!

patterns: Tell me the coffee shop menu
What do you have at the coffee shop?
responses: Our menu includes espresso, cappuccino, latte, mocha, and iced coffee.
We serve a range of drinks: espresso, americano, latte, cappuccino, macchiato, and more!
On the menu: brewed coffee, espresso, cold brew, frappes, and more!

patterns: What vegan items do you offer?
Do you have dairy-free or vegan drinks?
Is there anything vegan on your menu?
responses: Yes! We have almond, soy, and oat milk for our coffee, and some vegan snacks like avocado toast and hummus wraps.
We offer dairy-free milk options and vegan snacks. Just ask our staff for details!
We have vegan-friendly options like almond and oat milk for coffee and some plant-based snacks.

patterns: What can you recommend for diabetics?
Are there sugar-free options on the menu?
Can I find diabetes-friendly items here?
responses: We offer sugar-free syrups for our coffee, and have a selection of snacks suitable for diabetics.
We can make most drinks with sugar-free syrups, and our low-carb snacks are great for diabetics.
Yes, we have sugar-free options and some low-carb snacks for you!

patterns: How do I book a table?
Is it possible to reserve a table?
Can you help me with a reservation?
responses: You can make a reservation by calling us or booking online through our website.
To reserve a table, please give us a call or use our online booking system.
Yes, we take reservations! Call us or book a table through our website.

patterns: Is there internet access at the coffee shop?
responses: Yes, we offer free WiFi for all customers!
We have free WiFi â€“ just ask our staff for the password.
Absolutely, you can connect to our free WiFi. Ask for the password at the counter!

patterns: What are your hours of operation?
responses: We're open from 7 AM to 9 PM, Monday through Sunday.
Our hours are 7 AM - 9 PM every day.
We open at 7 AM and close at 9 PM daily!
